name: eleventy-retro-theme
description: A retro lavender/plum themed Eleventy starter inspired by Grav.

scripts.build:both: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:gh
scripts.release: npm run build:both && npm run deploy
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('Commands:
  npm start        Serve root
  npm run serve:gh Serve with GH prefix
  npm run build    Build to _site
  npm run build:gh Build to _ghsite
  npm run deploy   Deploy GH Pages
  npm run release  Build both + deploy');"

author: JudyWinsor
